articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Egypt, Barrick Gold sign 4 contracts for gold exploration - Reuters
articles.description: Egypt has signed four contracts with Barrick Gold (ABX.TO) for gold exploration in the country's Eastern Desert, the ministry of petroleum and mineral resources said on Tuesday.
articles.content: CAIRO, July 27 (Reuters) - Egypt has signed four contracts with Barrick Gold (ABX.TO) for gold exploration in the country's Eastern Desert, the ministry of petroleum and mineral resources said on Tue… [+482 chars]

articles.author: Nichola Saminather
articles.title: FOCUS-After COVID revenue collapse, Canadian municipalities face insurance premium spike - Reuters
articles.description: Canadian municipalities reeling from a pandemic-driven hit to revenues are facing an added blow from surging liability insurance costs, forcing them to raise property taxes or even cut services for residents.

articles.author: Nichola Saminather, Sohini Podder
articles.title: Prudential sells retirement business to Great-West Lifeco in $3.51 billion deal - Reuters.com
articles.description: Canadian insurer Great-West Lifeco Inc (Lifeco) said on Wednesday its U.S. unit would buy Prudential Financial Inc's full-service retirement business for about C$4.45 billion ($3.51 billion) in one of its biggest deals yet as it accelerates its expansion.
